name: Atomik Chaotik Bombing of Doom
description:
Atomik Chaotik Bombing of Doom is a game made for the exhibition "Atomik Bazar" in Fribourg as part of the series "Atomik [...] of Doom".

In this collaborative game, each player steers one of the two planes carrying a large bomb meant to dismantle a nuclear power plant.

The two players have to work together in order to transport the bomb to the target. But careful! The bomb is heavy, don't make the planes touch, and don't collide with the enemies, of which there are many!

Bonus: Hit as many seagulls as possible ;)

Move the left plane with WASD (S -> up, W -> down) Move the right plane with IJKL (k -> up, I -> down) Press Space ton drop the Bomb

Follow us on twitter: @SharpedStoneStd
Follow us on Facebook: @SharpedStoneStudios
